name: Levocetirizine Dihydrochloride
indications: Levocetirizine dihydrochloride is a histamine H 1 -receptor antagonist indicated for: • The treatment of the uncomplicated skin manifestations of chronic idiopathic urticaria ( 1.2 )
contraindications: Levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets are available as 5 mg breakable (scored) tablets, allowing for the administration of 2.5 mg, if needed. Levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets can be taken without regard to food consumption.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets, USP 5 mg are white film coated, scored, round, biconvex tablets debossed with '161' on one side and 'H' on other side.
                  NDC: 71335-0789-1: 30 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 71335-0789-2: 90 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 71335-0789-3: 28 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 71335-0789-4: 60 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  Storage:Store at 20° to 25° C (68° to 77° F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions: The use of levocetirizine dihydrochloride tablets are contraindicated in:
